name: dev
description: MyRefer(Web)のフロントエンド側プロジェクト

scripts.build: npm run css:build && npm run js:build
scripts.dev: npm run css:dev & npm run js:dev & npm run styleguide:dev
scripts.css:dev: node-sass --recursive --output-style compressed --source-map-embed true --source-map-contents true ./src/scss/style.scss ../public/assets/css/style.css && node-sass --watch --recursive --output-style compressed --source-map-contents true --source-map-embed true ./src/scss/style.scss ../public/assets/css/style.css
scripts.styleguide:dev: cpx '../public/assets/**/*' './docs/assets/' && styleguide --title 'MyRefer Styleguide' --kssSource 'src/scss/**/*.scss' --output 'docs' --styleSource '../public/assets/css/style.css' --overviewPath './src/scss/README.md' --watch --server --port 3000 --afterBody '<script src="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/2.2.0/jquery.min.js"></script><script src="//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jquery-cookie/1.4.1/jquery.cookie.min.js"></script><script src="//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/multiselect/2.2.9/js/multiselect.min.js"></script><script>$(window).bind("styleguide:onRendered", function(e) {var script = document.createElement("script"); script.type = "text/javascript"; script.src = "/assets/js/app.js"; var firstScript = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]; firstScript.parentNode.insertBefore(script, firstScript); });</script>'

author: PERSOL CAREER CO., LTD.
